name: 8 Ball Pool - Skillz Billiards
description:
Welcome to 8 Ball Pool - Skillz Billiards, the Skillz-powered pool game where you can compete with friends, ace the competition, and win cash prizes.

Ready to challenge your pool friends and become the Billiards King? Go online now, prove to your friends that you are the best eight ball pool player and take home prizes!
Honestly, there's no time like today to go pro, play the best 2D 8 ball pool mobile game for winning cash money prizes powered by Skillz, and ace the competition.

This is the free pool game where you can compete with your friends for cash and prizes and prove you are the king of the pros.

Never wait for your opponent in this addictive version of 8 ball pool.

And YES! It's true... the winner takes home real, hard, cold cash money prizes.

You can withdraw your winnings thru the game at any time thru Skillz via PayPal with the press of a button.

Practice earning extra score for speed, ball positioning, calling pockets, and trick shots for free, then turn Pro and play for money powered by Skillz in head-to-head competitions, leagues, and tournaments on 8 Ball Pool - Skillz Billiards, the best 8 ball pool game for competing with friends and winning cash.

Key features:

• Live head-to-head multiplayer
• Unlimited play, no energy or lives
• Extra score for speed, ball positioning, and called pockets
• Perform trick and bank shots for more points
• Play 1v1 against your pool friends
• Compete in games for cash and prizes
• Play in online tournaments with your billiards friends

Do you have what it takes to go Pro, compete against friends and become a Cash King in pool?

Find out today for free!
